answers.answer: Congrats!! I was so excited when I hit 99 to. Now I'm at 42, and it seems to be going really slow! Can't wait to meet my baby girl :)
Congratulations i also have 99 to go!!! I am excited to meet my angel
I'm at 53 days now and could be counting the seconds. I'm so ready. Third trimester has been tough on this mama!

55 days to go, but this is my 4th and I'm having lots of complications with this one that I didn't have with any of the others... Gestational diabetes and high blood pressure (not yet pre-eclampsia-just a little too high). But so far,  doc hasn't said anything about c-sec. I'm getting nervous though because my last was 9 lbs 8 is and gestational diabetes babies are bigger and I'm measuring 39 weeks now and I'm only 32.
78 dragging days left till my due date!!

Brandi ... you need to talk to or Dr for sure.. u should have a scheduled v section!! no way around it you are high risk and you last baby was 9lb. u tell himmm what youuu want.. !!! dont let him force u to push a huge baby out no safe!!

question: finally in the Double digits 99 days to go :-)
title: Finally finally finally!!!
